thread.section_title: PolicyGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PolicyGenius | policygenius.com
thread.title: CKJ

author: CKJ
title: CKJ
text: PolicyGenius made it easy to compare rates from several companies when I was looking for life insurance. After deciding what company to go with they also helped review the selections, fill out the necessary forms, and schedule the nurse's visit. This made the process of getting life insurance painless and I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a similar experience.
